author: cnbc.com
title: Lam Research: Fiscal 3Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
FREMONT, Calif. (AP) _ Lam Research Corp. (LRCX) on Tuesday reported fiscal third-quarter profit of $778.8 million.
On a per-share basis, the Fremont, California-based company said it had net income of $4.33. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $4.79 per share.
The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $4.36 per share.
The semiconductor equipment maker posted revenue of $2.89 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Six analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.85 billion.
For the current quarter ending in June, Lam Research expects its per-share earnings to range from $4.80 to $5.20. Analysts surveyed by Zacks had forecast adjusted earnings per share of $4.59.
The company said it expects revenue in the range of $2.95 billion to $3.25 billion for the fiscal fourth quarter. Analysts surveyed by Zacks had expected revenue of $2.91 billion.
Lam Research shares have climbed 15 percent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has stayed nearly flat. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $212.30, a rise of 67 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on LRCX at https://www.zacks.com/ap/LRCX
